mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CALL_HISTORY (call_Seq, call_Id, u_Id, c_Phone, call_Type, call_Time, call_Duration) VALUES (#{call_Seq}, #{call_Id}, #{u_Id}, #{c_Phone}, #{call_Type}, #{call_Time}, #{call_Duration})
